title: New: Cloud Boat – I Left for a Reason (It Escapes Me Now)
body: The formally **R&S** affiliated pop group **[Cloud Bout](https://www.facebook.com/cloudboat)** have a new single, “_I Left For a Reason (It Escapes Me Now)_“. It’s a rich, sometimes angst ridden but ultimately tender affair. “The river fell away, and washed me down” belts **Tom Clarke** repeatedly throughout the tracks main section; transforming the most dramatic of moments into slow motion poetry.
